EFI_PEI_PROGRESS_CODE_PPI Struct Reference


Data Fields

EFI_PEI_REPORT_STATUS_CODE ReportStatusCode

Detailed Description

This PPI provides the service to report status code. There can be only one instance of this service in the system.
